sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.* FROM AIR_BASEMETA_DTS T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM AIR_ORIENTMAP_DTS T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM AIR_PRODUCT_DTS T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM AIR_PRODUCTEO_DTS T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_ACQUT T WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE S.ZONE_CODE = T.ZONE_CODE AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ) ORDER BY T.ZONE_CODE

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_CONT T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM AIR_PRODUCT_DTS T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_DISTR T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.FILE_IDENTIFIER , T.TARGET_NAME , T.FILE_IDENTIFIER_DSCRT , T.ROLE_CD , T.AIRMAP_DSCRT , T.RESOLUTION , T.TOPIC_CATE_CD , T.LANGUAGE , T.COUNTRY , T.CHARACTERENCODING , T.ZONE_CODE , T.PH_COURSE , T.PH_NUM , T.RES_POSTNAME , T.RES_PHONE , T.RES_FAX , T.RES_ADDRESS , T.RES_POSTAL_CODE , DECRYPT(T.XMIN) XMIN , DECRYPT(T.XMAX) XMAX , DECRYPT(T.YMIN) YMIN , DECRYPT(T.YMAX) YMAX FROM META_AIRMAP_IDENT T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_MAIT T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_REFRC T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_AIRMAP_SPATIAL T , USR_AIR_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S
WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.PH_COURSE = S.PH_COURSE AND T.PH_NUM = S.PH_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.PH_COURSE , S.PH_NUM

SELECT T.ZONE_CODE , T.MAP5000_NUM , T.FILE_IDENTIFIER , T.LANGUAGE , T.RES_OFFICENAME , T.RES_POSTNAME , T.RES_PHONE , T.RES_FAX , T.RES_ADDRESS , T.RES_POSTAL_CODE , T.META_DATE , T.META_VERSION , T.DIST_FORMAT_NAME , T.DIST_FORMAT_VERSION , T.DIST_OFFICENAME , T.DIST_POSTNAME , T.DIST_PHONE , T.QUALITY_TARGET , T.DOCUMENT , T.TARGET_NAME , T.SPATIAL_DATA , T.SIGUNGU_NAM , T.SIGUNGU_CDE
FROM DEM_BASEMETA_DTS T , USR_DEM_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , DEM_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.GRID_INT = R.GRID_INT AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , LENGTH(S.MAP5000_NUM) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM DEM_GPSCOORD_DTS T , USR_DEM_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , DEM_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.GRID_INT = R.GRID_INT AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , LENGTH(S.MAP5000_NUM) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM DEM_PRODUCT_DTS T , USR_DEM_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , DEM_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.GRID_INT = R.GRID_INT AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , LENGTH(S.MAP5000_NUM) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_CONT T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_CONTR T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_DISTR T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.FILE_IDENTIFIER , T.ROLE_CD , T.AIRMAP_DSCRT , T.INPUT_CO , T.SPATIAL_DATA_CD , T.LANGUAGE , T.COUNTRY , T.CHARACTERENCODING , T.SCALE , T.TOPIC_CATE_CD , T.TARGET_NAME , T.FILE_IDENTIFIER_DSCRT , T.ZONE_CODE , T.MAP5000_NUM , T.RES_POSTNAME , T.RES_PHONE , T.RES_FAX , T.RES_ADDRESS , T.RES_POSTAL_CODE , T.GTYP_DST , DECRYPT(T.XMIN) XMIN , DECRYPT(T.XMAX) XMAX , DECRYPT(T.YMIN) YMIN , DECRYPT(T.YMAX) YMAX FROM META_ORT_IDENT T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_MAIT T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_REFRC T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM META_ORT_SPATIAL T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM ORT_BASEMETA_DTS T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.* FROM ORT_PRODUCT_DTS T , USR_ORT_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S , ORT_PRODUCT_DTS R WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND T.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.ZONE_CODE = R.ZONE_CODE AND S.MAP5000_NUM = R.MAP5000_NUM AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , SUBSTR(S.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , S.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.ZONE_CODE , T.LIDAR_IDN , T.EQUIP_NAME , T.EQUIP_INFO , T.LIDARORIGIN_FORM , T.LIDARORIGIN_YMD , T.COURSE_NUM , T.REFLECT_CNT , T.COORDINATE , T.CONST_CO , T.INPUT_CO , T.SECURITY_CDE , T.REFERENCE , T.PRP , T.CRS_IDN , T.MAP5000_NUM , T.SIGUNGU_CDE , T.NAME , DECRYPT(T.XMIN) XMIN , DECRYPT(T.XMAX) XMAX , DECRYPT(T.YMIN) YMIN , DECRYPT(T.YMAX) YMAX FROM LID_PRODUCT_DTS T , LID_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.LIDAR_IDN = S.LIDAR_IDN AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY SUBSTR(S.ZONE_CODE, 0, 4) , LENGTH(T.MAP5000_NUM) , SUBSTR(T.MAP5000_NUM, 0, 5) , T.MAP5000_NUM

SELECT T.ZONE_CODE , T.UTL3D_BRG , T.UTL3D_BN , T.UTL3D_TYPE , T.UTL3D_BGL , T.UTL3D_OW , T.UTL3D_BAR , T.UTL3D_BAD , T.UTL3D_LRN , T.UTL3D_BGH , T.UTL3D_MPN , T.UTL3D_WEB , T.UTL3D_TNA , T.UTL3D_TNB , T.UTL3D_TNC , T.UTL3D_TND , T.UTL3D_FTE , T.UTL3D_RTE , T.UTL3D_BTE , T.UTL3D_LTE , T.UTL3D_TTE , T.SHAPE , T.TDS_IDN , T.SIGUNGU_CDE , T.ZONE_NM , T.ZONE_SE , DECRYPT(T.XMIN) XMIN , DECRYPT(T.XMAX) XMAX , DECRYPT(T.YMIN) YMIN , DECRYPT(T.YMAX) YMAX FROM TDS_PRODUCT_DTS T , TDS_SUPPLYITEM_APP_NIIM S WHERE T.ZONE_CODE = S.ZONE_CODE AND T.TDS_IDN = S.TDS_IDN AND S.SUP_IDN = #supIdn# ORDER BY S.ZONE_CODE , S.TDS_IDN
